allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add timer types, constants, and initial useTimer hook

Implements Step 1 & 2 \(partial\) of US-1:
- Create Phase type and TimerState/SessionConfig types
- Define TABATA_CONFIG constants \(durations and intervals\)
- Implement useTimer hook with initialization test \(RED-GREEN-REFACTOR\)

Test coverage:
- Timer initializes with provided remaining time

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
